local_intent: Execute a short push stroke to advance the T-block along 0° with tool yaw set and retry once if slip occurs.
assumptions: Block and target zone are already roughly localized from earlier perception.
coherence_with_global: Matches the transfer stage of GLOBAL_BT: align to t_block, set yaw to 90°, then perform a push of 0.1m at 0°, verifying visibility afterward. Uses modest 1200 ms timeouts and adds a bounded retry consistent with recovery notes.
